Title: Professional Practice Assistant Professor, Director of Athletic Bands
Notes: Music (Trombone). Office: FAC 120. Dr. Lane Weaver is Director of Athletic Bands and Assistant Director of Bands at Utah State University where he directs the Aggie Marching Band the Basketball Pep Band the Low Brass Choir and the USU Alumni Band. He also assists with the Symphonic Band and Cache Wind Symphony and teaches applied trombone lessons.
